alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 8:49PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila, Maricopa and Pinal Counties through 1015 PM MST... At 849 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Miami, or near Globe, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Florence, Globe, Superior, Gold Canyon, Miami, Gold Camp, Cutter, Top-Of-The-World, Claypool, Florence Junction, Queen Valley, Canyon Lake, Superstition Mountains, Central Heights-Midland City, Tonto National Monument, Kings Ranch, Apache Lake, Boyce Thompson Arboretum, Inspiration and Roosevelt Estates. This includes the following highways... US Highway 60 between mile markers 204 and 271. AZ Route 70 between mile markers 253 and 263. AZ Route 77 between mile markers 160 and 170. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Dripping Springs; Globe, Miami; Mazatzal Mountains; Northwest Pinal County; Pinal, Superstition Mountains; Rio Verde, Salt River; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County; Superior; Tonto Basin
